Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: jack chan
Reviews.Content: User friendly Interface, solid Dvr with good image quality for this price range.Tech Support is based in U.S., Kevin was excellent at getting the dvr up and running, also setup the network and router for remote viewing on my Iphone.Would recommend this products.Jack

Reviews.Title: Great deal, works great!
Reviews.Author: Laura Bottecchia "lilah407"
Reviews.Content: I've had these up for several months now. Works great! Quality is fair. The instructions are a bit vague... never could figure out the web application to view it online?? But I haven't tried again since the initial set-up. The other settings were pretty user friendly and easy to figure out. Over all, very happy with the system for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kevin Vincent
Reviews.Content: It's Everything it claims to be an more. Very user friendly easy to hook up. Overal I give it 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Neil A. Fassbinder
Reviews.Content: I love it. Was easy to set up. Great quality for the cost. Haven't figured out how to view online yet though... directions are not very clear for that part.

Reviews.Title: Surveillance
Reviews.Author: Micheal E.
Reviews.Content: It is my first unit it was easy to set up user friendly great for residential and around your shop

Reviews.Author: jill melton
Reviews.Content: Works great, and the price, great!. Ty for allowing me the oppertunity to be able to afford a security system that was reasonably priced, with great quality video.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel Full CIF realtime surveillance recorder and playback surveillance DVR.
Includes 2 high resolution 600TVL cameras with Infra Red Cut Filter (ICR) function and powerful night vision to 50ft for indoor/outdoor use.
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts with Snapshot upon motion detection.
Powerful Plug and Play function, Powerful push alarm function and Free DDNS to use.
Combination DVR with 10'' color LCD to bring you great images. Fashionable design with high performance.
ProductInfo.Name: Guardian In-KT8184A-500GB 10 Inch 8 Channel DVR LCD Monitor H.264 Security DVR System with 2 Night Vision IR 520TVL Bullet Cameras and 500GB Hard Drive Home CCTV Surveillance Equipment (Black)
